title: Lt. Arnold and the Case of the Missing Biscuit
description: This children book entitled, "Lt. Arnold and the Case of the Missing Biscuit," is the first in a series of Children's books with Lt. Arnold and his assistant Don Keyy as the main characters. This book is geared toward children learning to read with the assistance of a parent or guardian. The author says, "What I am attempting to do is arouse their curiosity by wanting to know"; "What happens next?"Michael Daniels was born in Guyana. He is married and has five children. He likes to read and write poetry and design games. He is inspired by the teachings of his faith, some of which have given him a lot of ideas from which he is able to gather writing material.
author: Michael    Daniels
